description:
Why, it's lighter than air!
The aim of LiteGuard is to be the most simple, unambiguous and lightweight guard clause library available.
Compatible with .NET 3.5, Mono 2.10.8, Windows Store 8, Silverlight 4 and Windows Phone 7 (or later versions of each).
This is the LiteGuard binary package. Also available as a source code package (LiteGuard.Source). If your project is an application or library which is not packaged and/or exported for use in other solutions then the binary package is usually the best choice. If you are writing a library which is packaged and/or exported for use in other solutions then the source code package is usually the best choice.
We all have to do our bit in working toward the ultimate number of published guard clause libraries which, at current estimates, is somewhere in the region of 6.02214129(27) Ã— 10^23.
releaseNotes:
A minor release which changes the source code package to install as a development dependency by default. 

New: Change source code package to install as a development dependency - https://github.com/liteguard/liteguard/issues/73/
summary: The most simple, unambiguous and lightweight guard clause library. This is the binary package. Also available as a source code package (LiteGuard.Source).
title: LiteGuard
